::Spears::

She wondered who Inferno was?  She had always known the inferno as 
the place where evil sparks go when they leave the body.  She didn't 
think it would be a bot's name.
"I'll try to watch it then. And just what did you mean by just 
wondering?" she said with a smirk on her face.
Her face color was starting to return to normal. She saw the pod up 
ahead and slowed her walking pace.  This wasn't going to be easy for 
her.  She rung her hands together and prayed to the matrix that she 
cold make yet one more flight without a panick attack.  She had made 
it here in one piece, now she had to hope that the return flight was 
without incident.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker grins at her reaction, continuing to walk. "Just wondering, 
that's 
> all," he calls out behind him as the pod comes into view, "And 
you'd better 
> not let Inferno hear you use his name in vain."
